name: Easy Red
description: The invasion has begun. Land by sea, launch from gliders, fight in the fields, in the beaches and in the skies. it is time to free France.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 1500 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia gtx 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia gtx 1050 Storage: 1 GB available space
